attributes.additional_details:
This needs to be looked at in greater detail. There’s more people currently suffering with depression, anxiety and potential suicides, than there are people dying with Covid. The impact will be greater over the next 10 years on these people than the people who have had Covid.
There’s no support currently for those suffering with new mental illnesses that have been impacted by the governments decisions where jobs have been lost and livelihoods ruined. People can’t feed their kids! Re look at this
attributes.background: We want the government to see the impact of Mental Health over the figures or Covid-19. People are losing their lives, losing their sanity at a higher rate than Covid is killing people. The impact on the next generation, and the follow on impact will be huge. Do something now!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Mental health support is available via the NHS, although its availability will depend on local resources. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
